definition: حمي (حمو and حمى) ḥamiya a to be or become hot; to glow (metal); to flare up; to fly into a rage, become furious (على at) │ حمى الوطيسfierce fighting broke out II to make hot, heat (هـ s.th.), to heat to glowing (هـ metal); to fire up (هـ a stove); to kindle, inflame, stir up, excite (هـ s.th.); to bathe (= 3 حم II) IV to make hot, heat (هـ s.th.) حمو ḥamw heat │حمو النيل ḥ. an-nīl prickly heat, heat rash, lichen tropicus (eg.) حمو ḥumūw heat
